about.title: About Neozpir
about.description: Transforming businesses through innovative IT consulting solutions. We bridge the gap between technology and business success.

growth.title: Accelerate Growth
growth.desc: We believe that your success is also our success

focus.title: Focus on Whats Matter
focus.desc: Dont let any technological problems slow you down, Focus on solving your business problem first

service.mainText: Transform Your Business with Expert IT Consulting
service.secondaryText: We help organizations leverage technology to drive growth, improve efficiency, and stay ahead of the competition.

footer.tagline: Transforming businesses through innovative IT consulting solutions.

shopify.title: Why Use Shopify?
shopify.description: Shopify is a leading eCommerce platform that allows you to start, grow, and manage a business. It provides you with all the tools you need to sell online, on social media, or in person.

setup.title: Expert Store Setup
setup.description: We provide professional Shopify store setup and customization to get you started quickly and ensure your store reflects your brand identity.

development.title: Custom App Development
development.description: Need unique functionality? We develop custom Shopify apps to meet your specific business requirements and enhance your store's capabilities.

shopify.promotionalPrice: Only Pay 1$ per month for the first 3 Months

enterprise.title: Custom Enterprise Software Solutions
enterprise.description: We build scalable and robust enterprise software tailored to your specific business needs. From CRM to ERP, we've got you covered.

custom.title: Custom Software Development
custom.description: We design and develop custom enterprise applications from scratch, ensuring they align perfectly with your business processes.

integration.title: System Integration
integration.description: We integrate your existing systems and applications to improve data flow and streamline your operations.

enterprise.promotionalPrice: Contact us for a custom quote

automation.title: Streamline Your Business with Automation
automation.description: Automate repetitive tasks and workflows to improve efficiency and reduce human error. We provide custom automation solutions tailored to your business.

process.title: Business Process Automation
process.description: We analyze your business processes and identify opportunities for automation, implementing solutions that save you time and money.

integration.title: Application Integration
integration.description: We connect your applications to automate data transfer and workflows, ensuring seamless communication between your systems.

notFound.message: The page you are looking for does not exist.

customService.title: Custom Service
customService.description: Have a unique idea or a specific business need? We provide custom development services to bring your vision to life. Our team is ready to tackle any challenge and deliver a solution that fits your requirements.

consultation.title: Free Consultation
consultation.description: We start with a free consultation to understand your needs and goals. We'll discuss your project in detail and provide you with a clear roadmap and a transparent quote.

development.title: Full-Cycle Development
development.description: From planning and design to development, testing, and deployment, we handle the entire development process. We ensure your project is delivered on time and within budget.

getStarted.title: Ready to Get Started?
getStarted.description: Let's discuss your project and how we can help you achieve your goals. Contact us today for a free consultation.

translation.partnershipSubtitle: Join us to make the internet useful for everyone
translation.partnerBenefit: Join our mission to make the internet useful for everyone. By becoming a partner, you'll not only contribute to this goal but also earn a competitive commission for every new client you refer. Our dedicated team will provide you with all the necessary resources and support to succeed. There's no cost to join, and you can start earning right away.
